allow: Bash(# Install ai@6 to check what @ai-sdk/provider version it uses mkdir -p /tmp/ai6-check && cd /tmp/ai6-check && echo ''{}'' && npm install ai@6.0.86 --quiet ; cat /tmp/ai6-check/node_modules/@ai-sdk/provider/package.json)

Bash(# Install ai@6 deps to check useChat mkdir -p /tmp/ai6-react && cd /tmp/ai6-react && echo ''{}'' && npm install @ai-sdk/react@3.0.88 --quiet ; grep -n ""useChat\\|UIMessage\\|Message"" /tmp/ai6-react/node_modules/@ai-sdk/react/dist/index.d.ts)
